official_title: A bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to establish certain rules regarding the liability of corporate officers and employees for criminal acts with respect to hazardous waste.
subjects: Liability for toxic substances pollution damages

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide that both the corporate employee who commits a specified criminal act with respect to the disposal of hazardous waste and any responsible corporate officer shall be subject to prescribed criminal penalties.
